api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Fill your Hugging face API token. To find your token, visit https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens.

base_url.title: Base URL
base_url.description: Hostname for the endpoint. To use Inference API set to https://api-inference.huggingface.co, for Inference Endpoint set to your custom endpoint.

is_custom_endpoint.title: Is Custom Endpoint
is_custom_endpoint.description: Fill true if you are using a custom Inference Endpoint and not the Inference API.
